text: Motion
Motion

Huh...
Did I already drink out of that...?
Shall I make some more coffee?
Huh!?

No, no,
I can't let the idols take care of the producer.

Thank you.
I can make it myself, so it's okay.
I see.
Sure.

Oh, by the way, Hiori, do you want something to drink?
I'll make it.
No, I still have some left.
I-I see!
Well then, I'll get a refill!
Hmm...
(It's hard to gauge the distance...)

(She's a reliable girl...
Maybe it's counterproductive if I act weird...)
Alright...
...Producer,
...Huh?
Wouldn't it be better to use your time more efficiently?
...Huh?
How long have you been working?

I'm trying to hide it with coffee,
but you look more tired than before.
Is it that obvious?
Don't make fun of me.

No, I'm not making fun of you.
I just thought you'd notice.
I'll say this...

It's not just because it's me.
Anyone would notice.

I see...
I showed a bad side of myself, didn't I?

...
Do you not intend to stop?

Hmm...
I'm in a hurry. I have to push through now.

Then, shouldn't you use your time more efficiently?
I think you should take a break.

If you continue like this,
it won't be good for the producer or the work.

...Yeah, you're right.
I should take a quick nap.

I'm sorry for being inadequate.
Thank you, Hiori.
...Yes.
